ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone. I ve been playing EQ for a few months now... wow - Have things changed! A sense of community seems to actually take place over certain
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone.

I've been playing EQ for a few months now... wow - Have things changed! A
sense of community seems to actually take place over certain places.... neat.

I'm not a current practitioner of non-het sex but my first sexual experience
was with another boy, and I'm dating a bi-sexual woman and we are both gay
friendly... well she kind of has to be doesn't she?

Anyway - she plays EQ occassionaly but not nearly as much as I do. I get
extremely pissed off at all the rants and /shouts and even /oocs that come
across my screen bitching about "that fag Cros Treewind killed me for no good
reason." I try to keep things fair and inform them to please keep that kind
of talk to /tells or cut it out completely... that it's just not appropriate
behavior.... <shrugs> I get the feeling about 80% of these people I'm playing
with are in 8th grade with faces full of zits, not that the pimples go away
... :) - but anyway -----

It's nice to have a forum for EQers that are at least gay friendly.

Thanks for the forum and FYI - I'll also be starting a EQ-Pagan guild on the
new roleplaying server.... anyone interested?

BrymmStone (brymm@...)
